## 2.20.0

**Minor changes**

Added "static" version of the animated icons:

  - `loading-static`
  - `running-static`

Added new set of icons for Google services:

  - `google-docs`
  - `google-forms`
  - `google-slides`
  - `google-sheets`
  - `google-drive`


<small>[#1657](https://github.com/hashicorp/design-system/pull/1657)</small>
